metadata.name: Aquasol A D Drops 4000 IU Tablet

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For nutritional supplementation also for treating dietary shortage or imbalance

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Dihomo gamma linolenic acid or DHLA is an n 6 omega 6 polyunsaturated fatty acid It is comprised of 20 carbon atoms and three double bonds DHLA is a byproduct of the 18 carbon gamma linolenic acid GLA DHLA is then converted into prostaglandin E1 PGE1 PGE1 inhibits platelet aggregation and also exerts a vasodilatory effect
